full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Title
Royalty Free Multi-Media

## Reference Number
PW-PI-014-81339
Note: This is a modification 1 of the initial tender PW-PI-014-81339.

## Key Details

* **Publication Date**: August 11, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 23, 2022, 2:00 PM EST (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

## Solicited Goods and Services

* The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (global affairs Canada) is seeking a royalty-free multimedia site for its communications tools.
* The site should provide access to a large number of multimedia assets for use in various communications tools.

## Tender Procedure

* The tender is open to all interested suppliers.
* The tender will follow a best overall proposal approach.
* Bidders must submit their proposals electronically using Canada Post Connect.
* Inquiries can be sent to the contracting authority listed in this posting.

## Important Information for Suppliers

* Suppliers must ensure their bids are submitted electronically in accordance with the required format.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with the supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Required Documents

You can access the required documents at the following link:

* [Link 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/10/20d33e896f6d459ebd3d8e9826c0a86a/ABES.PROD.PW__PI.B014.E81339.EBSU000.PDF)
* [Link 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/15/cf18ad207c908143d59d1ea8aa402d89/ABES.PROD.PW__PI.B014.E81339.EBSU001.PDF)

Please note that the links will lead you to the required documentation in either English or French, depending on your preference.

## Contact Information

If you have any inquiries or concerns, please contact:

* James Lionel, PSPC Contracting Authority
* Email: [lionel.james@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](
